title: Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: When a view like the Navigator is resized smaller on linux using build 20011127 (not observed in build 20011116 on Nt2000), the tool items, including the pulldown menu icon (triangle) and the close icon (X), move below the label. This behavior can confuse users.
SR:
To reproduce the bug:
1. Open the application on a Linux machine with build 20011127.
2. Open the Navigator view.
3. Resize the view to make it smaller.
4. Observe the close button moving down below the label.
